entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING EAST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
